Former Chile President Pinera drowned following helicopter crashFormer Chilean President Sebastian Pinera died from asphyxiation due to submersion after the helicopter he was piloting crashed into a lake in southern Chile on Tuesday, the local prosecutor's office reported on Wednesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 15:01:29 GMT H6YRUCBL3ZNTDHRWP46KRYMP4M https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/former-chile-president-pinera-drowned-following-helicopter-crash-2024-02-07/Reuters世界美洲
Exclusive: EU border agency says stopping migration is impossibleIrregular immigration to the EU from Western Africa rose more than ten times on the year in January, according to the bloc's Frontex border agency, which expects overall arrivals to grow in 2024 and says halting the movement of people completely is impossible. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 14:44:44 GMT GC3XAOZTTZKJFCEMI3PS2VFEHA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-border-agency-says-stopping-migration-is-impossible-2024-02-07/Gabriela Baczynska世界欧洲
Family of teen trapped in Gaza ask UK to help them reuniteThe family of a Palestinian teenager who is trapped in Gaza called on the British government on Wednesday to allow him to enter the UK, after ministers dropped their opposition to his urgent legal challenge at the eleventh hour. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 14:04:51 GMT NKVBVELKBRLMVL6QLSVZZ564ZI https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/family-teen-trapped-gaza-ask-uk-help-them-reunite-2024-02-07/Sam Tobin世界英国
US faces heightened risk from Russia, North Korea, Treasury financing report findsThe United States faces heightened risk from Russia, which is trying to acquire goods with military applications, the U.S. Treasury Department said in fresh National Risk Assessments on Money Laundering, Terrorist Financing, and Proliferation Financing released on Wednesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 14:02:08 GMT 2ENLULSA7RJIXMU4IAGFFH5C5E https://www.reuters.com/world/us-faces-heightened-risk-Russia-north-korea-treasury-financing-report-finds-2024-02-07/Reuters世界
Russia's GDP boost on military spending belies wider economic woesRussia's economy rebounded sharply from a slump in 2022, annual data will show on Wednesday, but the growth relies heavily on state-funded arms and ammunition production and masks problems that are hampering an improvement in Russians' living standards. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 13:59:43 GMT VHMJEOIESRP4DOQQW4MZXOVH64 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russias-gdp-boost-military-spending-belies-wider-economic-woes-2024-02-07/Darya Korsunskaya, Alexander Marrow世界欧洲
IAEA chief says Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant has enough cooling water - Russian agenciesU.N. nuclear watchdog chief Rafael Grossi visited the Russian-occupied Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant in Ukraine on Wednesday and said there were enough wells on site to supply cooling pools, Russian news agencies reported. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 13:52:30 GMT GN7R76MMPFKP7CR7FOVXSUTPEU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/iaea-chief-says-zaporizhzhia-nuclear-plant-has-enough-cooling-water-Russian-2024-02-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Bangladesh will not let in any more Rohingya refugees - ministerBangladesh said on Wednesday it will not allow any more Rohingya refugees from Myanmar to enter the country because supporting the huge numbers already there threatens its own security. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 13:49:01 GMT VJA44FGW5JJORLVPD7VLWJGOHY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-will-not-let-any-more-rohingya-refugees-minister-2024-02-07/Ruma Paul, Sudipto Ganguly世界亚太地区
South Africa's Ramaphosa to announce election date this month - spokesmanSouth African President Cyril Ramaphosa will announce the date of this year's general election later this month, his spokesman said on Wednesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 13:27:47 GMT Q4ITZ3TSM5KTVHD42C26ZPYQGM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/south-africas-ramaphosa-announce-election-date-this-month-spokesman-2024-02-07/Reuters世界非洲
Small Indian state passes landmark civil code opposed by MuslimsLawmakers in a small Indian state ruled by Prime Minister Narendra Modi's Hindu nationalist Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) on Wednesday approved landmark legislation to unify personal laws across religions, a moved opposed by many minority Muslims. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 13:26:20 GMT J47IZZKOQFKDNEA5AAYDVVCE3M https://www.reuters.com/world/india/small-indian-state-passes-landmark-civil-code-opposed-by-muslims-2024-02-07/Rupam Jain世界印度
US, UK ship investors hit by soaring Red Sea insurance - sourcesWar underwriters have raised the premiums they charge to U.S., British and Israeli firms by as high as 50% for ships transiting the Red Sea and some providers are avoiding such business due to targeting of the vessels by Yemen's Houthis, sources said. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 13:22:47 GMT 6UPLGOHESBPBRAE66BLPLEPGKM https://www.reuters.com/business/us-uk-ship-investors-hit-by-soaring-red-sea-insurance-sources-2024-02-07/Jonathan Saul, Carolyn Cohn商业
Pakistan election 2024: Who are the presidential candidates?Pakistan holds its national elections on Thursday as the country grapples with an economic crisis and political uncertainty following the ouster of former Prime Minister Imran Khan in 2022. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:26:25 GMT TZNUJRKYWBNTTKTK4M6LV2F3JI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/who-are-key-players-pakistans-general-elections-2024-02-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
